> <OLD>
>
> Straightshot rushes over to Leo Prime and hops up on his shoulder.  She is
> quick to wisper in his ear what Tucson is up to.
>
> "Sorry, forgot ya didn't know sign language.  Here's the deal, Tucson is not
> turning on us purposely, he's doing it so he can fool Magmatron into falsely
> trusting him.  It's the only way he can get around Magmatron without
> suspicion.  Pass it  along in a silent com to the others.  And play along
> with him.  It's the only way we're gonna get outa this in one piece and if
> you don't then, it won't work.  So pleeeease, try and make this work."
>
> Tucson turns to Leo Prime.  And then turns to Magmatron.
>
> "  Hmmm, certainly a proposal worth taking you up on.  All right, Rodimus
> and Leo Prime!  There can be only ONE leader among us!  And that leader is
> ME!    You cringe like cowards!  You're afraid to face me in a fight because
> you know you do not measure up to my caliber!  None of you were trained by
> Master Yoketron, nor did you take his training as seriously as I have!  Now,
> let that mistake be your downfall!"
>
> In the mean time, he sends an internal message to the others, one that
> Magmatron can not hear.
>
> " If we are to get out of this without suspicion or death, I need you all to
> play along with me.  I am not really turning on you, it's an act that has to
> be played just right or else it will fail miserably.  I need your FULL
> cooperation on this and trust what I am about to do, even though, it looks
> difficult to trust.  Rodimus, Leo, I need you to fight me with everything
> you got, and take heart, if I fall, I understand why, and anything that
> happens to you, I apologize in advance.   We can do this, Maximals, we can
> be far better than Magmatron.  Now, time to put our plan into action.
> Remember... FULL COOPERATION FROM ALL OF YOU OR ELSE THIS DOES NOT WORK."
>
> Tucson roars, as he turns to Leo and the others.
>
> "Well, it's not polite to keep your opponent waiting!"

As TUSCON attempted to transmit his message all he could back was
static and internal feedback. It would seem that radios and comlinks
were still down here in the tunnels.

However LEO PRIME tunred to look at TUSCON, he nodded ever so slightly
to try ant let TUSCON know that he understood what was going on.
Evidently STRAIGHTSHOT's words were enough to give him a few clues as
to what to do.

"Tuscon, you are under arrest. If you are not willing to come quietly,
then you will have to come the hard way!" LEO frowned in looked only
semi-believably. He was obviously not the best of actors.

However none of that mattered as the whole rooom continued to shake as
fire and energy spewed itself up out of the pit, destrying the remains
of the bridge that was over it as well destroying all of the equipment
that SABERBACK and MAGMATROn had placed around it. Even the stone that
had fell over SABERBACK himself was blown away.

All around the room vibrated dangerously as the fire and energy
scorched the roof of the cave.

MAGMATRON looked at the fire and energy and then back at TUSCON and
then his remaing soldiers, "Retreat!" he called out. "We have lost
what we came for, retreat."

MAGMATRON began to back out twards the caves that were coming out of
the middle of center of the room, protected from the fire and energy
only because they faced outward instead of inward.

SKYBYTE wasted no time in bolting, followed by the remining SHARKTICONS.

Even the PREDACONS were looking at the tunnel. "Skyshadow!" CRYOTEK
said, "Leave the Maximals to fend for them selves, we have everything
we need." He glanced around the room. "Pick up our wounded and
retreat!"

The room was beginning to heat up!

(TAG)

- Preston
